Commands.Sketch Summon: 1-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all targets.  Attributes and effects depend on the equipped summon.  Grants Small Max BRV Up.
Commands.Chocobo Kick: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Chocobo Summon.
Commands.Whispering Wind: Raises all party members' BRV and recovers HP based on Attack.  No BRV attack before the HP attack.  Requires Sylph Summon.
Commands.Hellfire: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Ifrit Summon.
Commands.Diamond Dust: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Shiva Summon.
Commands.Judgement Bolt: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Ramuh Summon.
Commands.Zantetsuken: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack with a low BREAK chance.  Requires Odin Summon.
Commands.Tidal Wave: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Leviathan Summon.
Commands.Divine Judgment: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Alexander Summon.
Commands.Brotherly Love: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Brothers Summon.
Commands.Tornado Zone: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack with a higher chance of initiating a Chase Sequence.  Requires Pandemonium Summon.
Commands.Megaflare: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Bahamut Summon.
Commands.Dark Messenger: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Requires Diabolos Summon.
Commands.Sketch: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Afflicts the target with Sketch for 1 turn.  Grants Small Attack Up.  When the target afflicted with Sketch acts, Relm can act immediately after without increasing the turn count.  Sketch also lowers Attack.
Commands.Sketch Long: Inflicts 「Sap」 to target for 2 turns  Extends the duration of the 「Sketch」 debuff by 1 turn  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Star Prism: 6-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  BRV Hits are be dispersed when there are multiple enemies  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  HP Damage is split equally amongst targets  Inflicts 「Sketch」 to all enemies for 2 turns

Passives.Sketch Summon Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Sketch Summon.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Fast Writing Proficiency: Slightly raises party's Speed while buffed.
Passives.Sketch Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Sketch.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Sketch Summon Charge: Increases the max uses of Sketch Summon by 1.
Passives.Sketch Charge: Increases the max uses of Sketch by 1.
Passives.Future Genius Artist: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Sketch Summon Focus Attack: Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to a single target with AoE attacks
Passives.Sketch Summon Extend: When using  Sketch Summon :- Before the Summon ability is triggered, raises party BRV based on Max BRV- Monderately raises BRV damage dealt- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Slightly improves the  Max BRV Up  buff and extends its duration by 2 turns- Grants  Medium Speed Up  for 8 turnsWhile buffed,  BRV Attack  turns into  BRV Attack+ :- Increases the number of BRV Hits to 2- Moderately raises its potency- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with the  Sketch  debuff
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Sketch Extend: Sketch  use +1When using  Sketch :- Increases the number of BRV Hits to 3- Tremendously raises its potency- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with the  Sketch  debuff- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves the  Attack Up  buff and extends its duration by 3 turns- Triggers and HP attack after useAfter using  Sketch , turns into  Sketch+ : - If the attack lands, moves the user's next turn to right before the target's (except during Summon)- Inflicts  Blind  to target for 1 turn- Reverts back to  Sketch  after use
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Sketch Long Extend: When using  Sketch Long , adds the following effects:- Slightly raises Max BRV

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Sketch Long  use +1When using  Sketch long :- Extends the duration of  Sap  and  Sketch  by 1 turn
Weapons.Chocobo Brush CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Sketch Summon.Raises the potency of Max BRV Up and extends its duration.
Weapons.Da Vinci Brush CP: 35: Raises the potency of Sketch and Sketch+ and lowers their Action Delay.Extends the duration of Sketch by 1 turn.Raises the potency of Attack Up.
Weapons.Magical Brush CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Star Prism
